p: Monitoring the network formed by differentiated TIME cell cultures treated with NS1 by time-lapse microscopy for up to 9â€¯h, revealed a reversal of the endothelial cell self-assembly into tubular structures in NS1-treated cultures. The rate of the endothelial cell detachment from the vessel-like structures was asynchronous ( Fig. 3 d). Movies to show this dynamic process are available ( Supplementary video S1, Supplementary video S2). Our observations support the notion that NS1-induced hyaluronan and suppression of CD44 increase the levels of polydisparse hyaluronan and perturbs endothelial cell differentiation.
